text: James Hype (born 1989) is an English DJ, producer and remix artist from The Wirral. He is best known for his single "More Than Friends", released by Warner Music on 7 July 2017. The single reached number 8 in the UK Top 40 and number 1 in the UK dance singles chart. Before chart success, James made his name producing remixes for international artists including OT Genesis and Clean Bandit He is also a DJ ambassador for the equipment manufacturer Pioneer DJ featuring in their online videos. He presented a late night radio show on Thursday nights on KISS FM, from July 2017 to November 2019. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:17em;"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:1em;"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="7"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:1em;"| Certifications ! rowspan="2"| Album |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| UK ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| AUT ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| BEL ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| FRA ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| GER ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| IRE ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| SWI |- ! scope="row"| "More than Friends" | 2017 | 8 || 26 || 12 || 140 || 23 || 20 || 29 | * BPI: Platinum * BEA: Gold * BVMI: Gold | rowspan="4" |- ! scope="row"| "No Drama" | 2018 | — || — || — || — || — || — || — | |- ! scope="row"| "I Was Lovin' You" | 2019 | 92 || — || — || — || — || — || — | |- ! scope="row"| "Afraid" | 2020 | — || — || — || — || — || — || — | |- | colspan="11" style="font- size:90%"| "—" denotes a recording that did not chart or was not released in that territory. |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:English electronic musicians Category:English DJs Category:English record producers Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Liverpool Category:Electronic dance music DJs
